name: Open Box
overview:
Open Box provides unique software solutions for companies who’s needs surpass that of which can be found in a box or on the shelf.

Open Box is a Vancouver-based, award-winning custom software development company that understands your business needs, delivers on time and on budget and is willing to guarantee that in our contracts.

They specialize in working with small to medium enterprises that have revenues above 1 million and where an off-the-shelf solution will not meet the companyâ€™s needs.

Every company needs ways to leverage their spending and increase revenue. Our custom software solutions:

* Help you capitalize on new opportunities
* Increase staff and customer satisfaction
* Improve operational efficiencies
* Increase revenue for each unit of expense
